metadata.title: CVE-2024-32606 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: HDF5 Library through 1.14.3 may attempt to dereference uninitialized valuesin h5tools_str_sprint in tools/lib/h5tools_str.c (called fromh5tools_dump_simple_data in tools/lib/h5tools_dump.c).

criterions.comment: hdf5 package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
